name: Install aws-cli.txt - Alpine
description: This section provides a command to install the AWS Command Line Interface (AWS CLI) on Alpine Linux, a lightweight and secure Linux distribution. The command first installs Python3 and pip (a package installer for Python) using the Alpine package manager 'apk'. It then upgrades pip to the latest version and installs the AWS CLI package using pip. Finally, it cleans up the package cache to save disk space.
use_cases: Installing AWS CLI on Alpine Linux
Setting up a development environment for AWS on Alpine Linux
Automating AWS tasks using scripts on Alpine Linux

name: Install aws-cli.txt - Ubuntu

use_cases: Setting up AWS command line tools on Ubuntu
